data.answer: Interactions between the outer surface of Q[n]s and the aromatic rings of the polyaromatic compound

data.question: What happens to the Q[6]-based assembly when it is left in a dilute HCl solution?
data.answer: The Cs+ ions are released from the crystals

data.answer: It is added to the mixture to selectively bind Cs+ ions
